TABLE.NAME: facetoface
TABLE.COMMENT: Each facetoface activity has an entry here

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: thirdparty
FIELD.COMMENT: email address of a third party involved in this activity

FIELD.NAME: thirdpartywaitlist
FIELD.COMMENT: Set to 1 if the third party wants to receive signups/cancellations about wait-listed sessions, 0 otherwise.

FIELD.NAME: confirmationsubject
FIELD.COMMENT: Subject line for the confirmation emails

FIELD.NAME: confirmationinstrmngr
FIELD.COMMENT: Contents of confirmation emails sent to instructors and managers

FIELD.NAME: confirmationmessage
FIELD.COMMENT: Contents of confirmation emails sent to students

FIELD.NAME: waitlistedsubject
FIELD.COMMENT: Subject of the email sent when the user is on a wait-list

FIELD.NAME: waitlistedmessage
FIELD.COMMENT: Contents of the email sent when a user is on a wait-list

FIELD.NAME: cancellationsubject
FIELD.COMMENT: Subject of the emails sent when users get out of an activity

FIELD.NAME: cancellationinstrmngr
FIELD.COMMENT: Contents of the emails sent to instructors and managers when students get out of an activity

FIELD.NAME: cancellationmessage
FIELD.COMMENT: Contents of the emails sent to users who got out of an activity

FIELD.NAME: remindersubject
FIELD.COMMENT: Subject of reminder emails sent before an activity

FIELD.NAME: reminderinstrmngr
FIELD.COMMENT: Contents of the emails sent to instructors and managers when a user is reminded of an upcoming activity

FIELD.NAME: remindermessage
FIELD.COMMENT: Contents of the emails sent to users reminding them of an upcoming activity

FIELD.NAME: reminderperiod
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of days before the activity that reminders will be sent. A value of 0 disables the reminder.

FIELD.NAME: requestsubject
FIELD.COMMENT: Subject of booking request emails

FIELD.NAME: requestinstrmngr
FIELD.COMMENT: Contents of the emails sent to instructors and managers when a user requests a activity booking

FIELD.NAME: requestmessage
FIELD.COMMENT: Contents of the emails sent to users requesting an activity booking

TABLE.COMMENT: Users with a trainer role in a facetoface session

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the table

TABLE.NAME: facetoface_sessions
TABLE.COMMENT: A given facetoface activity may be given at different times and places

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: facetoface
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the facetoface activity this session is for

FIELD.NAME: capacity
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of students who can enroll in this session. A value of 0 means unlimited.

FIELD.NAME: allowoverbook
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag to turn on waitlisting of signups over capacity.

FIELD.NAME: details
FIELD.COMMENT: Extra information about this session

FIELD.NAME: datetimeknown
FIELD.COMMENT: A value of 0 means that the date and time are unknown whereas a value of 1 means that both are known.

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Total duration (in minutes) of the session. A session may be split across multiple dates, this is the total.

FIELD.NAME: normalcost
FIELD.COMMENT: The normal (non-discounted) cost of the session

FIELD.NAME: discountcost
FIELD.COMMENT: Discounted cost of the event

KEY.COMMENT: primary key of the table, please edit me
